name: Pudding
description: It's a thing for managing instances!

PUDDING_AUTH_TOKEN.description: A secret token used for web authentication

PUDDING_SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Default Slack channel name for notifications

PUDDING_SLACK_TEAM.description: Slack team name for hubot notifications API requests

PUDDING_SLACK_TOKEN.description: Slack auth token for hubot notification API requests

PUDDING_WEB_HOSTNAME.description: The publicly-accessible hostname of your heroku app, e.g. https://the-name-of-your-app.herokuapp.com/

PUDDING_INSTANCE_RSA.description: RSA private key for use in cloud init script templates.  Must be a gzipped and base64-encoded string

PUDDING_INSTANCE_YML.description: YAML configuration used to generate instance-specific configurations based on "site" and "env"

PUDDING_SENTRY_DSN.description: Sentry DSN for sentry integration, e.g. https://REDACTED@app.getsentry.com/1234

PUDDING_INIT_SCRIPT_TEMPLATE.description: A Golang text/template string used to generate the script executed by cloud init.  Must be a gzipped and base64-encoded string
